trans-unit.source: Encapsulates text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.
trans-unit.target: Incapsula manipolazioni di visualizzazione testo layout informazioni (ad esempio, l'allineamento, l'orientamento e si interrompe), (ad esempio l'inserimento dei puntini di sospensione e la sostituzione di numeri nazionali) e le funzioni OpenType.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Many common formats are provided through the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Molti formati comuni vengono forniti tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>enumerazione.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: StringFormat objects can be changed.
trans-unit.target: StringFormat oggetti possono essere modificati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |FormatFlags|0 (no flags are set)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | FormatFlags |&0; (Nessun flag impostato) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>|</xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from the specified existing <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto esistente specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object from which to initialize the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto da cui inizializzare la nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: format is .
trans-unit.target: formatis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione per il nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration and language.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione e la lingua.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione per il nuovo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the language of the text.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica la lingua del testo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'allineamento orizzontale della stringa.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> to specify the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>per specificare l'allineamento verticale della stringa.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that specifies the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> enumerazione che specifica l'allineamento orizzontale della stringa.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta di questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object this method creates.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto creato da questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the language that is used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la lingua usata quando numeri locali vengono sostituiti con i numeri europei.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Un identificatore di lingua di supporto NLS (National Language) che identifica la lingua che verrà usata quando numeri locali vengono sostituiti con i numeri europei.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref>
trans-unit.target: È possibile passare il <> </> *> proprietà di un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto come l'identificatore di lingua NLS.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Si supponga, ad esempio, creare un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto passando la stringa "ar-EG" a un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>costruttore.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Se si passa il <> </> *> proprietà dell'oggetto insieme a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.<xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref></xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*> method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: per il <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>(metodo), quindi i numeri indo-arabici verranno sostituiti dai numeri europei al momento della visualizzazione.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.SetDigitSubstitution*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the method to be used for digit substitution.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il metodo da utilizzare per la sostituzione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration value that specifies how to substitute characters in a string that cannot be displayed because they are not supported by the current font.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> valore di enumerazione che specifica come sostituire i caratteri in una stringa che non possono essere visualizzati poiché non sono supportati dal tipo di carattere corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata a Dispose consente le risorse usate da questo <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>oggetto riallocazione per altri scopi.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione che contiene informazioni di formattazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"></xref> enumeration that contains formatting information.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags"> </xref> enumerazione che contiene informazioni di formattazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un generico predefinito <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic default instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza predefinita generica della <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| If you make changes to the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> object returned from the GenericDefault property, these changes persist, and future calls to the GenericDefault property reflects these changes.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|0| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0| Se si apportano modifiche per il <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>oggetto restituito dalla proprietà GenericDefault, queste modifiche verranno mantenute e le chiamate successive alla proprietà GenericDefault riflette le modifiche.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic default <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di generico <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto generico tipografica <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for a generic typographic instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat> class.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza tipografica generica della <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>classe.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|24580 (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags> and <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.)| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| |<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>|&24580; (<xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>, <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>e <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags>.) | | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A>| <xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute>| | <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A>|0|</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionLanguage%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.DigitSubstitutionMethod%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.HotkeyPrefix%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringTrimming></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Trimming%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.LineAlignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringAlignment></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags></xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A generic typographic <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un generico tipografico <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le tabulazioni per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a text line and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di spazi tra l'inizio di una riga di testo e la prima tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances (in number of spaces) between tab stops.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di distanze, in numero di spazi, tra le tabulazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> oggetto per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: In a graphical user interface, a hot key is the underlined letter in a word (usually combined with another key, such as the Alt key) that you can press on the keyboard to activate the functionality that the word represents.
trans-unit.target: In un'interfaccia utente grafica, un tasto di scelta rapida è la lettera sottolineata in una parola (in genere combinata con un'altra chiave, ad esempio il tasto Alt) che è possibile premere sulla tastiera per attivare la funzionalità che rappresenta la parola.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object, the default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref> oggetto per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> dell'oggetto, il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'allineamento verticale della stringa.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A> to specify the horizontal alignment of the string.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>per specificare l'allineamento orizzontale della stringa.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration that represents the vertical line alignment.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"> </xref> enumerazione che rappresenta l'allineamento verticale.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the language and method to be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Specifica la lingua e il metodo da utilizzare quando i numeri locali vengono sostituiti dai numeri europei.

trans-unit.source: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.
trans-unit.target: Un identificatore di lingua di supporto NLS (National Language) che identifica la lingua che verrà usata quando numeri locali vengono sostituiti con i numeri europei.

trans-unit.source: You can pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object as the NLS language identifier. For example, suppose you create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> constructor. If you pass the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.LCID*> property of that <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object along with <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> to the SetDigitSubstitution method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.
trans-unit.target: È possibile passare il <> </> *> proprietà di un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto come l'identificatore di lingua NLS.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Si supponga, ad esempio, creare un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto passando la stringa "ar-EG" a un <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>costruttore.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> Se si passa il <> </> *> proprietà di tale <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>oggetto insieme a <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> al metodo SetDigitSubstitution, quindi indo-arabici verranno sostituita dai numeri europei al momento della visualizzazione.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: An element of the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"></xref> enumeration that specifies how digits are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento del <xref href="System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute"> </xref> enumerazione che specifica come vengono visualizzati i numeri.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that represent the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: Specifica una matrice di <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> strutture che rappresentano gli intervalli di caratteri misurati con una chiamata per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: Setting more than 32 character ranges is not allowed and will cause an <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di più di 32 intervalli di caratteri non è consentito e causerà un <xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.OverflowException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"></xref> structures that specifies the ranges of characters measured by a call to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*> method.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Drawing.CharacterRange"> </xref> strutture che specifica gli intervalli di caratteri misurati con una chiamata per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureCharacterRanges*>

trans-unit.source: More than 32 character ranges are set.
trans-unit.target: Vengono impostati gli intervalli di più di 32 caratteri.

trans-unit.source: Sets tab stops for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Imposta le tabulazioni per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Each tab-stop offset in the `tabStops` array, except the first one, is relative to the previous one.
trans-unit.target: Ogni offset di tabulazione nel `tabStops` matrice, ad eccezione del primo, è relativo alla precedente.

trans-unit.source: The first tab-stop offset is relative to the initial offset position specified by `firstTabOffset`.
trans-unit.target: Il primo offset di tabulazione è relativo della posizione dell'offset iniziale specificata da `firstTabOffset`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the initial offset position is 8 and the first tab-stop offset is 50, then the first tab stop is at position 58.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se la posizione di offset iniziale è 8 e il primo offset di tabulazione è 50, è la prima tabulazione alla posizione 58.

trans-unit.source: If the initial offset position is zero, then the first tab-stop offset is relative to position 0, the string origin.
trans-unit.target: Se la posizione di offset iniziale è zero, il primo offset di tabulazione è relativo alla posizione 0, l'origine di stringa.

trans-unit.source: The number of spaces between the beginning of a line of text and the first tab stop.
trans-unit.target: Numero di spazi tra l'inizio di una riga di testo e la prima tabulazione.

trans-unit.source: An array of distances between tab stops in the units specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di distanze tra le tabulazioni nelle unità specificate per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte la <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto in una stringa leggibile.

trans-unit.source: Only the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A> property is converted.
trans-unit.target: Solo il valore di <xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>proprietà viene convertita.</xref:System.Drawing.StringFormat.FormatFlags%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una rappresentazione di stringa del <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration for this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> enumerazione per questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"></xref> enumeration that indicates how text drawn with this <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"></xref> object is trimmed when it exceeds the edges of the layout rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.StringTrimming"> </xref> enumerazione che indica la modalità testo disegnato con questo <xref href="System.Drawing.StringFormat"> </xref> oggetto viene ritagliato quando supera i bordi del rettangolo di layout.
